content: Pick up the Fire Bellflower on the left at the bottom of the wooden path before you head toward the Revenants and the vine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Height of Ember' and the sub-subsection 'Yoaguai Chief - Father of Stones'.
The content is as follows:
Pick up the Fire Bellflower on the left at the bottom of the wooden path before you head toward the Revenants and the vine.
